mapper.insert: insert into notice(n_no, n_title, n_content, n_writer) values(seq_notice_no.nextval, #{n_title}, #{n_content}, #{n_writer})
mapper.select:
select n_no, n_title, n_content, n_writer from notice
AND n_no=#{n_no}
AND n_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND n_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND n_writer LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by n_no desc
